JScr_OnPageReady
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if((page.doShuffle()==true)&&(AnyToBool(NE(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","",""),1))))
 page._Shuffle();
 else
 page._ZuffiListe("-1");

 DefineGlobalVar("gvPage",AnyToObject(page.Name()));
 DefineGlobalVar("gvOrgOnBR",onBrowserResize);
 window.onresize=function(){gvOrgOnBR(); page=gvPage; page._onResize()};

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ASEventSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return;
 
 if(value==3)
 {
 var autoConfig=AnyToInt(GetVariableEx("Projectsettings","PageAutoConfig","0","Variablen"));
 if(autoConfig==1)
 page._AT_Edit(1);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__OnPageReady
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(this.obj.scrollHeight > this.obj.offsetHeight)
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("scrollInd");
 else return; 
 
 MyPage = page;
 jQuery(this.obj).scroll(function(){MyPage._onScroll(page.Name());});

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnBeforePageReady
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var PS = page._cfwSendAPI("getPageState", page.Name());
 if(PS != 2)
 page._newPage(true);

 var _lp = false;
 var _slvp = true;
 if(page['_LastPage']!=null)
 {
 _lp = page._LastPage();
 }
 if(page['_Testmode']!=null)
 {
 _slvp = !AnyToBool(page._Testmode());
 }
 page._cfwSendAPI("newPage",page,_lp,_slvp,"");
 
 if(PS == 2)
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",page.Name(),"2","","");
 

 jQuery(this.obj).removeClass("page");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("currentPage");
 
 if(ElementQueries!=null)
 {
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(GetAuthorMode(),1))) 
 setTimeout(function(){ElementQueries.init()}, 10);
 else
 ElementQueries.init();
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__showInfoPopUp
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var S;
 var comp = AnyToObject(cmpName); 
 var noPic = 0;
 var noText = 0;
 var noVideo = 1;
 
 if(comp['_PopUpType'] != null) 
 var PopUpType = comp._PopUpType();
 else 
 var PopUpType = -1;
 
 var c = AnyToStr(FindObject(comp));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(c,"@0")))
 {
 S=AnyToStr(comp.Klicktext());
 if(S != "" && PopUpType != 2)
 gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 else
 { 
 gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("none");
 noText = 1;
 }
 }
 else return;
 
 if(AnyToBool(NE(comp.KlickAudio(),"")))
 {
 page._PlayAudio(comp.KlickAudio());
 }
 
 if(comp['KlickBild']!=null)
 { 
 if(comp.KlickBild() != "" && PopUpType != 0)
 {
 var PName=AnyToStr(comp.KlickBild());
 var i=AnyToInt(StrPos(",",PName));
 if(AnyToBool(GT(i,0)))
 PName = StrCopy(PName,1,Sub(i,1)); 
 gvCFW.InfoBild2.Picture(PName);
 if(noText == 1) 
 page._setPopupImageStyle(PName,"blur");
 else
 page._setPopupImageStyle(PName,page._PopupImageType()); 
 }
 else
 { 
 page._setPopupImageStyle("","none");
 noPic = 1;
 }
 }
 else
 { 
 page._setPopupImageStyle("","none");
 noPic = 1;
 }

 if(comp['KlickVideo']!=null)
 { 
 if(comp.KlickVideo() != "" && (PopUpType == 3 || PopUpType == -1))
 {
 gvCFW.InfoVP.FilenameMP4(comp.KlickVideo());
 noVideo = 0; 
 
 if(gvCFW._Volume() == 0)
 { 
 gvCFW.InfoVP._setVolume(0);
 }
 var nav = gvCFW.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting();
 if(nav == 0 || nav == 1)
 gvCFW.InfoVP.ShowControls(true);
 else 
 gvCFW.InfoVP.ShowControls(false);
 gvCFW.InfoVP._finished(false);
 
 if(gvCFW.AP.State()==1) 
 {
 
 gvCFW.btRepeat.OnClick(); 
 page._AudioPaused(true);
 } 
 }
 }
 
 if(NOT(jQuery(comp.obj).hasClass("clicked")))
 jQuery(comp.obj).addClass("clicked");
 
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.obj).css("display","none"); 
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnClose.obj).css("display","inline-block");
 
 gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption(comp.KlickTitel()); 
 if(gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption() != "" && PopUpType != 2)
 gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("inline-block"); 
 
 gvCFW.InfoText.Caption(S);
 gvCFW.Info.Left(0);
 gvCFW.Info.Top(0);
 gvCFW.Info.Visible(true);
 gvCFW.Info.cssDisplay("inline-flex");

 var titel=""; 
 if(comp['KlickTitel']!=null) 
 titel=AnyToStr(comp.KlickTitel());
 if(titel=="") titel="Information";
 ShowMobileDialog(gvCFW.Info,titel);
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").removeClass();
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("commentbox");
 jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("hotspotbox"); 
 if(noPic == 1) jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("noPopupPic");
 if(noText == 1) jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("picPopUp");
 if(noVideo == 0) jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("videoPopUp"); 
 
 S=AnyToStr(comp.Sprechertext());
 if(S != "")
 { 
 page.Sprechertext(S);
 var cfw=pages[jQuery(this.obj).parents(".CFW_S_Idea")[0].obj];
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',cfw,'btText','_checkEnabled','');
 if(S=="") S=" ";
 if(AnyToBool(page._cfwSendAPI('getComponentAttrValue',cfw,cfw,'_SpeakerTextMode'))==true)
 page._cfwSendAPI('ExecuteFunctionOnComponents',cfw,'GlossarText','HTMLText',S);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_richtigeAntwortSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var x;
 var P,rb;
 var s;
 s=AnyToStr("0");
 this._richtigeAntwort(value);
 this.Checked(value);
 x=AnyToInt(0);
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(this._richtigeAntwort(),1)))
 {
 while(AnyToBool(NE(s,"@0")))
 {
 x=AnyToInt(Add(x,1));
 s=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(s,"@0")))
 {
 rb=AnyToObject(s);
 if(AnyToBool(NE(rb.Name(),this.Name())))
 rb.richtigeAntwort(0);
 }
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(AnyToBool(page._Testmode()) == true) {
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","","")==1)
 gvCFW.btBack.OnClick();
 else {
 page.doCheckTest();
 gvCFW.btNext.OnClick();
 }
 }
 else {
 
 if (page._isSolutionVisible() == false)
 page.doCheckTest();
 else {
 
 if (gvCFW.btNext.Enabled() == true) {
 
 gvCFW.btNext.OnClick();
 }
 
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnPageShown
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(this.obj.scrollHeight > this.obj.offsetHeight)
 { 
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("scrollInd");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("scrollIndCenter");
 }
 else return; 
 
 MyPage = page;
 var N = this.Name(); 
 jQuery(this.obj).scroll(function(){MyPage._onScroll(N);});

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnOrientationChange
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(AnyToBool(page._pageScrolled())) return;
 
 if(this.obj.scrollHeight > this.obj.offsetHeight)
 { 
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("scrollInd");
 jQuery(this.obj).addClass("scrollIndCenter");
 }
 else return; 
 
 MyPage = page;
 var N = this.Name(); 
 jQuery(this.obj).scroll(function(){MyPage._onScroll(N);});

JavaScript.Name: JScr_OnInternalInit
JavaScript.ScriptData:
jQuery(this.obj).css("flex-direction","row");
 jQuery(this.obj).css("flex-wrap","wrap");
 
 var x=0; 
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 var S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(S,"@0")))
 { 
 var rbt=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(rbt._richtigeAntwort()))
 rbt.Checked(true);
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_LayoutSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return;
 var v;
 page._Layout(value);
 page.ipTop.cssClass(StrReplace(page.ipTop.cssClass(),"hidden",""));
 page.ipLeft.cssClass(StrReplace(page.ipLeft.cssClass(),"hidden",""));
 page.ipRight.cssClass(StrReplace(page.ipRight.cssClass(),"hidden",""));
 page.ipBottom.cssClass(StrReplace(page.ipBottom.cssClass(),"hidden",""));
 value=value.split(";");
 for(var x=0;x<4;x++)
 {
 v=value[x];
 if(x==0&&v==0)
 page.ipTop.cssClass(AnyToStr(page.ipTop.cssClass()+" "+"hidden"));
 if(x==1&&v==0)
 page.ipLeft.cssClass(AnyToStr(page.ipLeft.cssClass()+" "+"hidden"));
 if(x==2&&v==0)
 page.ipRight.cssClass(AnyToStr(page.ipRight.cssClass()+" "+"hidden"));
 if(x==3&&v==0)
 page.ipBottom.cssClass(AnyToStr(page.ipBottom.cssClass()+" "+"hidden"));
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_BoxLayoutSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return;
 page._BoxLayout(value);
 var LayoutPattern=value.split(";");
 var box=LayoutPattern[0];
 box=AnyToObject(box);
 var c=box.cssClass();
 var w=LayoutPattern[1];
 LayoutPattern=w.split(",");
 for(var x=0; x<LayoutPattern.length; x++)
 { 
 i=LayoutPattern[x];
 if(x==0)
 {
 c=c.replace(" flex_row_wrap","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_col_wrap","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_row","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_col","");
 if(i==1) c=(c+" flex_row");
 if(i==2) c=(c+" flex_row_wrap");
 if(i==3) c=(c+" flex_col");
 if(i==4) c=(c+" flex_col_wrap");
 if(i>=1) box.cssDisplay("inline-flex");
 if(i==0) box.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 if(x==1)
 {
 c=c.replace(" flex_just_spc_start","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_just_spc_cntr","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_just_spc_end","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_just_spc_btwn","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_just_spc_arnd","");
 c=c.replace(" nonflex_left","");
 c=c.replace(" nonflex_cntr","");
 c=c.replace(" nonflex_right","");
 if(AnyToStr(box.cssDisplay())=="flex"||AnyToStr(box.cssDisplay())=="inline-flex")
 { 
 if(i==0) c=(c+" flex_just_spc_start");
 if(i==1) c=(c+" flex_just_spc_cntr");
 if(i==2) c=(c+" flex_just_spc_end");
 if(i==3) c=(c+" flex_just_spc_btwn");
 if(i==4) c=(c+" flex_just_spc_arnd");

 }
 else
 { 
 if(i==0) c=(c+" nonflex_left");
 if(i==1) c=(c+" nonflex_cntr");
 if(i==2) c=(c+" nonflex_right");
 }
 }
 if(x==2)
 { 
 c=c.replace(" flex_items_start","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_items_cntr","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_items_end","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_items_stretch","");
 if(i==0) c=(c+" flex_items_start");
 if(i==1) c=(c+" flex_items_cntr");
 if(i==2) c=(c+" flex_items_end");
 if(i==3) c=(c+" flex_items_stretch");
 }
 if(x==3)
 { 
 c=c.replace(" flex_alignself_start","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_alignself_min","");
 c=c.replace(" flex_alignself_stretch","");
 c=c.replace(" minH","");
 if(i==0) c=(c+" flex_alignself_stretch");
 if(i==1&&box._BoxID()!=-1) c=(c+" flex_alignself_start");
 if(i==0||i==1) box.HeightType(3);
 if(i>=2)
 {
 c=(c+" flex_alignself_min");
 if(i==2||i==4) box.HeightType(2);
 if(i==3||i==5) box.HeightType(0);
 if(i==4||i==5) c=(c+" minH");
 }
 }
 }
 box.cssClass(c);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ContainerCountSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var cell, S;
 page._ContainerCount(value);
 var x=0;
 while(x<value)
 {
 x++;
 S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("ipContainer",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(S,"@0")))
 {
 cell=AnyToObject(StrConcat("ipContainer",x)); 
 S=cell.cssClass(); 
 if(S.indexOf("nonflex")!=-1) 
 cell.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 else 
 cell.cssDisplay("inline-flex");
 }
 } 
 while(x<4)
 {
 x++;
 S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("ipContainer",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(S,"@0")))
 {
 cell=AnyToObject(StrConcat("ipContainer",x));
 cell.cssDisplay("none");
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__setPopupImageStyle
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var picObject;
 var picURL;
 if (imageType !== 'none') {
 picURL = expandmetavar(imageName, page.Name());
 picObject = AnyToObject(gvCFW.InfoBild2);
 jQuery(picObject.obj).removeClass("cover_pic");
 jQuery(picObject.obj).removeClass("contain_pic");
 jQuery(picObject.obj).css("display","inline-block");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoContainerBild.obj).css("display","inline-block");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).addClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoText.obj).addClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBTContainer.obj).addClass("mar_l40");
 }
 if (imageType === 'blur') {
 
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBlurContainer.obj).css("background-image", "url('" + picURL + "')");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoContainerBild.obj).css("background-image", "url('" + picURL + "')");
 jQuery(picObject.obj).addClass("contain_pic");
 } else if (imageType === 'cover') {
 
 jQuery(picObject.obj).addClass("cover_pic");
 } else if (imageType === 'none') {
 
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoContainerBild.obj).css("display","none");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoText.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBTContainer.obj).removeClass("mar_l40");
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__checkScrollHeight
JavaScript.ScriptData:
container = AnyToObject(container);
 
 if(container.obj.scrollHeight > container.obj.offsetHeight)
 { 
 jQuery(container.obj).addClass("scrollInd");
 jQuery(container.obj).css("overflow-y","auto"); 
 MyPage = page;
 var N = container.Name(); 
 jQuery(container.obj).scroll(function(){MyPage._onScroll(N);});
 container.setAsParent(page.scrollInd);
 page.scrollInd.cssDisplay("block");
 }
 else
 { 
 jQuery(container.obj).removeClass("scrollInd");

 }

JScr_OnClick
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var container = this.getParentasComp();
 if(container.obj.scrollHeight > page.OffsetHeight()-50)
 container.obj.scrollTo(0, page.OffsetHeight()-50);
 else
 container.obj.scrollTo(0, container.obj.scrollHeight);

JavaScript.Name: JScr__ImageTypeSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
if(typeof(value)=="undefined")
 return; 
 page._IType(value);
 
 var picObject;
 var cc = page.Bild.cssClass();
 cc = StrReplace(cc, " contain_pic", "");
 cc = StrReplace(cc, " cover_pic", "");
 page.BlurContainer.cssDisplay("none");
 
 if (value !== 'none')
 var picURL = page.Bild.Picture();

 if (value === 'blur' || value === 'none')
 cc += " contain_pic";
 
 if (value === 'blur') {
 
 page.BlurContainer.BackgroundImage(picURL);
 page.BlurContainer.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 if (value === 'cover')
 
 cc += " cover_pic";

 page.Bild.cssClass(cc);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_SaveTestState
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var TestseitenListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","TestPageList","","");
 if(TestseitenListe!="")
 TestseitenListe=TestseitenListe.split(",");
 else
 TestseitenListe=[];
 var TestPunktListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","TestPoints","","");
 if(TestPunktListe!="") 
 TestPunktListe=TestPunktListe.split(",");
 else
 TestPunktListe=[];
 var GesamtPunktListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","Points","","");
 if(GesamtPunktListe!="") 
 GesamtPunktListe=GesamtPunktListe.split(",");
 else
 GesamtPunktListe=[]; 
 var TestErgebnisListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","TestResultList","","");
 if(TestErgebnisListe!="") 
 TestErgebnisListe=TestErgebnisListe.split(",");
 else
 TestErgebnisListe=[];
 var AntwortListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","Antworten","","");
 if(AntwortListe!="")
 AntwortListe=AntwortListe.split(",");
 else
 AntwortListe=[];
 if(typeof(PartialPoints)!="undefined") {
 var TeilPunktListe=PartialPoints;
 if(TeilPunktListe!="") 
 TeilPunktListe=TeilPunktListe.split(",");
 else
 TeilPunktListe=[];
 }
 else
 {
 PartialPoints="";
 TeilPunktListe=[];
 }
 
 var index=TestseitenListe.indexOf(page.Name());
 if(index == -1)
 index = TestseitenListe.length;
 
 TestseitenListe.splice(index,1,page.Name());
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","TestPageList",TestseitenListe.join(","),"");

 if(page.Result()==1)
 { 
 TestPunktListe.splice(index,1,page._punkte());
 TestErgebnisListe.splice(index,1,"1");
 }
 else
 { 
 TestPunktListe.splice(index,1,"0");
 TestErgebnisListe.splice(index,1,"0"); 
 }
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","TestPoints",TestPunktListe.join(","),"");
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","TestResultList",TestErgebnisListe.join(","),"");
 
 GesamtPunktListe.splice(index,1,page._punkte());
 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","Points",GesamtPunktListe.join(","),"");
 

 AntwortListe.splice(index,1,page._LastAnswer());

 page._cfwSendAPI("writeVar","Global","Antworten",AntwortListe.join(","),"");

 TeilPunktListe.splice(index,1,page._TP());
 PartialPoints=TeilPunktListe.join(",");

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ShowComment
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var noPic = 0; var noText = 0; var noTitle = 0; if(S == page.Feedback_NLF() && AName == page.FBNLF_Audio() && PName == page.FBNLF_Picture()) { if(page._showNLF() == 1 || (AnyToBool(page._Testmode()) == true)) return; else page._showNLF(1); } if((AnyToBool(page._Testmode()) == false) || (AnyToBool(EQ(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","",""),1)))) { if(AnyToBool(page.DoAudioComment())||AnyToBool(QF)) { if(AName != "") page._PlayAudio(AName); } if((AnyToBool(page.DoTextComment())||AnyToBool(QF))) { if(S != "" && S != "
") { gvCFW.InfoText.Caption(S); gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("inline-block"); jQuery(gvCFW.Info.obj).css("text-align","left"); } else { gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("none"); noText = 1; } if(page.Result() == 1) { gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption(page.FBPos_Header()); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).addClass("fb_correct"); } else { gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption(page.FBNeg_Header()); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).addClass("fb_incorrect"); } jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).css("margin-bottom","0"); if(gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption() != "" && gvCFW.InfoTitel.Caption() != "
") { gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("inline-block"); if(gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay()=="none") jQuery(gvCFW.InfoTitel.obj).css("margin-bottom","5%"); } else { gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("none"); noTitle = 1; } } else { gvCFW.InfoText.cssDisplay("none"); gvCFW.InfoTitel.cssDisplay("none"); noTitle = 1; noText = 1; } if(AnyToBool(page.DoPictureComment()) && PName != "") { var i=AnyToInt(StrPos(",",PName)); if(i > 0) gvCFW.InfoBild2.Picture(StrCopy(PName,1,Sub(i,1))); else gvCFW.InfoBild2.Picture(PName); } else { page._setPopupImageStyle(PName, "none"); noPic = 1; } if(AnyToBool(page.DoTextComment()) || AnyToBool(page.DoPictureComment())) { if(noText == 0 || noTitle == 0 || noPic == 0) { jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnClose.obj).css("display","none"); if (parseInt(page.Result()) === 1) { if(AnyToBool(page.DoPictureComment()) && PName != "") page._setPopupImageStyle(PName, page._PopupImageTypeFBPos()); gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.Visible(true); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.obj).css("display","inline-block"); gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.Visible(false); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.obj).css("display","none"); gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.Visible(false); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.obj).css("display","none"); } else { if(AnyToBool(page.DoPictureComment()) && PName != "") page._setPopupImageStyle(PName, page._PopupImageTypeFBNeg()); gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.Visible(false); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnNext.obj).css("display","none"); if (page._vZaehler() < page.AnzahlVersuche() || page.AnzahlVersuche() == 0) { gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.Visible(true); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.obj).css("display","inline-block"); } else { gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.Visible(false); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnAgain.obj).css("display","none"); } if (page._vZaehler() < page.AnzahlVersuche() && page.AnzahlVersuche() != -1) { gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.Visible(false); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.obj).css("display","none"); } else { gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.Visible(true); jQuery(gvCFW.InfoBtnSolution.obj).css("display","inline-block"); } } gvCFW.Info.Left(0); gvCFW.Info.Top(0); gvCFW.Info.Visible(true); gvCFW.Info.cssDisplay("flex"); ShowMobileDialog(gvCFW.Info,page._PopUpTitle()); jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").removeClass(); jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("commentbox"); if(noText == 1 && noTitle == 1) jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("picPopUp"); if(page._PopupImageType() == 'none' || noPic == 1) jQuery("div#IdeaRTPopupMobile").addClass("noPopupPic"); } } }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_SaveAnswer
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var antw;
 var res=AnyToStr("0");
 var x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(antw.Checked(),1)))
 {
 res=AnyToStr(x);
 break;
 }
 }
 page._LastAnswer(page._ZuffiListe()+";"+res);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ShowSolution
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var antw, antw2, comp;
 var x;
 
 page._xZaehler(AnyToInt(page._xZaehler()+1));
 
 if(vZaehler==1)
 {
 x=AnyToInt(0);
 while(AnyToBool(LT(x,page._AnzAntw())))
 {
 x=AnyToInt(Add(x,1));
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 jQuery(antw.obj).removeClass("incorrect");
 jQuery(antw.obj).removeClass("correct");
 
 
 var selected = AnyToBool(antw.Checked());
 var correct = AnyToBool(antw._richtigeAntwort());
 
 if (selected && correct) {
 jQuery(antw.obj).addClass("correct");
 }
 if (selected && !correct) {
 jQuery(antw.obj).addClass("incorrect");
 }
 }
 }
 if(vZaehler==2)
 {
 x=AnyToInt(0);
 while(AnyToBool(LT(x,page._AnzAntw())))
 {
 x=AnyToInt(Add(x,1));
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 jQuery(antw.obj).removeClass("incorrect");
 jQuery(antw.obj).removeClass("correct");

 antw.Checked(False);
 WriteToConsole(antw.Name()+" / "+AnyToBool(EQ(antw._richtigeAntwort(),1))); 
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(antw._richtigeAntwort(),1)))
 {
 antw.Checked(True);
 jQuery(antw.obj).addClass("correct");
 }
 }
 
 page._cfwSendAPI("disableNavigation","Ok","","","");
 jQuery(gvCFW["btOK"].obj).addClass("dis"); 
 page.AnzahlVersuche(-1);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ShowAnswer
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var comp;
 var Antworten=page._LastAnswer();
 page._ZuffiListe("");
 if(page.doShuffle()==true&&AnyToBool(EQ(page._Testmode(),true)))
 {
 page.doShuffle(false);
 var Textliste=[];
 var Corrliste=[];
 var Comliste=[];
 var Comliste2=[];
 var x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 Textliste.push(comp.Caption());
 Corrliste.push(comp.richtigeAntwort());
 Comliste.push(comp._QF());
 Comliste2.push(comp._QFAudio());
 } 
 x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 var y=StrCopy(Antworten,1,1);
 Antworten=StrDelete(Antworten,1,1);
 comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 comp.Caption(Textliste.splice(y,1));
 comp.richtigeAntwort(Corrliste.splice(y,1));
 comp._QF(Comliste.splice(y,1));
 comp._QFAudio(Comliste2.splice(y,1));
 }
 } 
 i=StrPos(";",Antworten);
 Antworten=StrDelete(Antworten,1,i);
 x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 i=AnyToInt(StrPos(x,Antworten));
 comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(GT(i,0)))
 comp.Checked(1);
 else
 comp.Checked(0);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_DoComment
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var S,T,PName,AName,obj;
 var Comp;
 var i;
 
 page.DisableAll();
 if(AnyToBool(value))
 {
 page.Result(1); 
 if(AnyToBool(page._Testmode())==false)
 {
 
 page.btCheck.HTMLText(page.btCheck._Text2());
 
 S=AnyToStr(page.Feedback_Richtig());
 AName=AnyToStr(page.FBPos_Audio());
 PName=AnyToStr(page.FBPos_Picture());
 
 
 
 
 
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._ShowLoesung()))
 {
 page._isSolutionVisible(true); 
 page.doShowSolution(1);
 }
 if(page.AudioFileName() != "" && AnyToBool(page._endOfAudio()))
 page._newPage(false); 
 page._pageFinished(true); 
 page._cfwSendAPI("_enableNaviNext");
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",page.Name(),"2","","");
 page.btCheck.HTMLText(page.btCheck._Text2()); 
 if(page.OffsetWidth() <= 800)
 page._scrollToTop();
 }
 }
 else
 {
 page.Result(0);
 if(AnyToBool(page._Testmode())==false)
 {
 AName=AnyToStr(page.FBNeg_Audio());
 PName=AnyToStr(page.FBNeg_Picture());
 if(AnyToBool(page._MultiTextComment())&&page.AnzahlVersuche()!=0) 
 S=AnyToStr(page.DoMultiTextComment());
 else
 {
 S=AnyToStr(page.Feedback_Falsch());
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 }
 if(page._vZaehler() == page.AnzahlVersuche() && page.AnzahlVersuche() != 0)
 {
 page._cfwSendAPI("_enableNaviNext");
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",page.Name(),"2","",""); 
 page.btCheck.HTMLText(page.btCheck._Text2());
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._ShowLoesung()))
 page.doShowSolution(2);


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 }
 }
 }
 if(AnyToBool(page._Testmode())==false)
 {
 TimerStart("iTimer");
 page.ShowComment(S,AName,PName);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_CheckUebung
JavaScript.ScriptData:
page._vZaehler(Add(page._vZaehler(),1));
 var antw;
 var x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(antw.Checked())==true&&AnyToBool(antw._richtigeAntwort())==true)
 {
 page.DoComment(1);
 page._TP(page._punkte());
 return;
 }
 }
 page.DoComment(0);
 page._TP(0);

JavaScript.Name: JScr_DisableAll
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var antw;
 page._cfwSendAPI("disableNavigation","Ok","","","");
 jQuery(gvCFW["btOK"].obj).addClass("dis");
 var x=AnyToInt(0);
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 jQuery(antw.obj).children().attr("disabled",true);
 antw.Enabled(false);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_ResetPage
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var antw;
 var x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 antw=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(page._ResetMode(),1)))
 antw.Checked(false);
 antw.Enabled(true);
 jQuery(antw.obj).children().attr("disabled",false);
 }
 if(AnyToBool(page._HideComment())) 
 page.HideComment(); 
 
 page._cfwSendAPI("enableNavigation","Ok","","","");
 jQuery(gvCFW["btOK"].obj).removeClass("dis");

JavaScript.Name: JScr_doShowSolution
JavaScript.ScriptData:
page._vZaehler(page.AnzahlVersuche());
 page.DisableAll();
 page.Anweisung.Visible(false);


 jQuery(page.obj).addClass("myAnswer");

 if (page._isSolutionVisible() == false) {
 page._isSolutionVisible(true);
 page.SolutionSwitch.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 if(page.OffsetWidth() <= 800)
 page._scrollToTop(); 
 }
 
 if(value==2)
 {

 page.ShowSolution(2);
 page._ShowMode(1);
 
 if(AnyToBool(gvCFW.btNext.Enabled()) == false && page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","","") != 1) 
 {
 if(page.AudioFileName() != "" && AnyToBool(page._endOfAudio()))
 page._newPage(false); 
 page._pageFinished(true); 
 page._cfwSendAPI("_enableNaviNext");
 page._cfwSendAPI("setPageState",page.Name(),"2","","");
 page.btCheck.HTMLText(page.btCheck._Text2());
 }
 }
 else
 {

 page.ShowAnswer();
 page.ShowSolution(1);
 page._ShowMode(0);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__Shuffle
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var Textliste=[];
 var Corrliste=[];
 var Comliste=[];
 var Comliste2=[];
 var x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 var comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 Textliste.push(comp.Caption());
 Corrliste.push(comp.richtigeAntwort());
 Comliste.push(comp._QF());
 Comliste2.push(comp._QFAudio());
 }
 x=0;
 while(x < page._AnzAntw())
 {
 x++;
 var y=AnyToInt(Random(Textliste.length));
 if(y>9) y=0;

 comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 comp.Caption(Textliste.splice(y,1));
 comp.richtigeAntwort(Corrliste.splice(y,1));
 comp._QF(Comliste.splice(y,1));
 comp._QFAudio(Comliste2.splice(y,1));

 page._ZuffiListe(AnyToStr(page._ZuffiListe())+y);
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__initTestPage
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var nav = gvCFW.PrjSettingsObj._NavigationSetting();
 if((nav == 1 || nav == 2) && AnyToBool(page._newPage()))
 page._cfwSendAPI("_disableNaviNext"); 
 
 if(AnyToBool(page._Testmode())==true)
 {
 page._cfwSendAPI("_disableNavigation"); 
 
 if(page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","DisplayMode","","")==1)
 {
 page.Anweisung.Visible(false);
 page.btCheck.HTMLText(page.btCheck._Text3()); 
 page._cfwSendAPI("_enableNaviBack");
 var TestseitenListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","TestPageList","","");
 if(TestseitenListe!="")
 { 
 TestseitenListe=TestseitenListe.split(",");
 WriteToConsole("_init - Testseitenliste: "+TestseitenListe);
 var index=TestseitenListe.indexOf(page.Name());
 
 if(index != -1)
 {
 
 var AntwortListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","Antworten","","");
 if(AntwortListe!="")
 AntwortListe=AntwortListe.split(",");
 
 var TestErgebnisListe=page._cfwSendAPI("readVar","Global","TestResultList","","");
 if(TestErgebnisListe!="") 
 TestErgebnisListe=TestErgebnisListe.split(","); 
 var res=TestErgebnisListe[index];
 var answ=AntwortListe[index]; 
 
 
 
 if(typeof(res)!="undefined" || typeof(answ)!="undefined")
 { 
 page._LastAnswer(answ);
 page.Result(res);
 if(res==1)
 page._isSolutionVisible(true);
 else
 page.SolutionSwitch.State(0); 
 } 
 page._vZaehler(page.AnzahlVersuche());
 page.ShowAnswer();
 page.DisableAll();
 page.doShowSolution(1); 
 }
 }
 }
 else
 {
 page.SaveAnswer();
 page.SaveTestState();
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr_AnzahlAntwortenGet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var S; 
 var value=AnyToInt(page.maxAnzahl());
 var y=0;
 for(var x=1; x<=value; x++)
 {
 S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(NE(S,"@0")))
 y++;
 else
 break;
 }
 page._AnzAntw(y); 
 return AnyToStr(page._AnzAntw());

JavaScript.Name: JScr_AnzahlAntwortenSet
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var rbt, S;
 if (AnyToInt(value)>AnyToInt(page.maxAnzahl()))
 value=AnyToInt(page.maxAnzahl()); 
 page._AnzAntw(value);
 var cell=AnyToObject(page._MainContainer());
 var x=0;
 while(x < value)
 {
 x++;
 S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(S,"@0")))
 {
 rbt=AnyToObject(InsertVertex(page,"SmartTemplates.sc_Antwort",StrConcat("Antwort",x),cell));
 rbt.Name(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 rbt.__LI(page.__LI());
 rbt.__LN(0);
 rbt.Caption(StrReplace(page.la_CompText1(),"#n#",x));
 rbt._DefaultText(StrReplace(page.la_CompText1(),"#n#",x));
 rbt.cssClass(rbt.cssClass()+" flex_grow");
 rbt.WidthType(3);
 }
 else
 rbt=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(AnyToBool(rbt._richtigeAntwort()))
 rbt.Checked(true); 
 }
 
 var y=page.maxAnzahl(); 
 while(x < y) {
 DeleteObj("Antwort"+y);
 y--;
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__setQFElem
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var Comp; 
 var x=AnyToInt(0);
 while(AnyToBool(LT(x,page._AnzAntw())))
 {
 x++;
 Comp=AnyToObject(StrConcat("Antwort",x));
 if(Comp._QF)
 { 
 if(Comp._QF()!=""||Comp._QFAudio()!="")
 page._setQFHotSpot(x);
 }
 }

JavaScript.Name: JScr__setQFHotSpot
JavaScript.ScriptData:
var S=AnyToStr(FindObject(StrConcat("qfHotSpot",x)));
 if(AnyToBool(EQ(S,"@0")))
 { 
 var qfElem=DuplicateVertex("qfHotSpot","",page,"qfHotSpot"+x);
 qfElem.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 else
 { 
 var qfElem=AnyToObject("qfHotSpot"+x); 
 qfElem.cssDisplay("inline-block");
 }
 var Comp=AnyToObject("Antwort"+x);
 qfElem.Width(Comp.OffsetWidth());
 qfElem.Height(Comp.OffsetHeight());
 qfElem.Left(Comp.OffsetLeft());
 qfElem.Top(Comp.OffsetTop());
